prompts.response: I'm doing well, thank you! How can I assist you today?
I don't have personal preferences, but I can help you find information about colors!
Why did the scarecrow win an award? Because he was outstanding in his field!
I can assist with a variety of tasks, including answering questions, providing information, and engaging in conversation.
I don't have real-time data, but I can help you find a weather website!
